issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.
issuetype.name: Epic

fields.description:
h3. Current state

1.5 millions records in the contract system is taking 3.5 minutes per period of each placement to calculate. The booking screen inside Ignitia also takes 3.5 minutes to find the correct service fee, rebate. This is just for the billable costs - not including the payable side.

Cost refresh for Prisma is susceptible to performance issues as it is currently running on shared infrastructure with the Ignitia product (shared database).

For cost refresh a thread is created per booking making the solution susceptible to high I/O and CPU.  e.g. 1 concurrent user with a Cost Refresh of 1000 bookings = 1000 threads, 50 concurrent users with a cost refresh of 1000 bookings = 50,000 threads.
h3. Desired state

Performance needs to be 1000's of contract lookups in sub second times.

Cost refresh should have isolated hardware away from the Ignitia product so that availability can be guaranteed for Prisma to function correctly.

Remove the per-booking multi-threading model.

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.
issuetype.name: Epic

fields.description:
h3. Epic description 

As an approver, I want to receive an email notification when an invoice is ready for my approval, so that I don't need to go to Ignitia home page and check.

In order to facilitate the client invoice approval process, there should be email notifications in place that would allow approvers approve invoices via the URL in the email.

This will help with the communication, especially for managers who don't use Ignitia on a regular basis.
h3. *Business outcome*
 * Email notifications of what's ready for approval and what's been approved

h3. *User persona*

_Approver (roles may vary)_ - would want to receive an email notification that invoices are ready for approval.

_AR clerk_ - would want to receive an email notification that invoices have been approved.
h3. Epic/Issue background

All invoices ready for approval appear on the Ignitia home page, however, this may not be sufficient for users who don't user Ignitia on a daily bases.

In this case, it needs to be communicated separately outside Ignitia that invoices are ready for approval. 

Email notifications will speed up the approval process and allow AR clerk to send invoices to clients sooner.

fields.description:
EF startup time will affect availability of the Ignitia product.

IIS worker processes do get recycled and the speed of the recycle is being impacted by EF to the tune of 20+ seconds on some low end hardware.

There are some recommendations online about how to reduce this. We should time-box and see if we can eliminate the slow startup.

fields.description:
Ignitia needs to allow agency users to :
 # quickly assess forex exposure
 # apply forex rate changes to bookings to ensure the accrued cost aligns with their current liability
 # apply forex rate changes to both AP and AR to ensure the AP and AR liabilities (in base currency) align with the current trading rate of the currency
 # optionally (if the client contracted terms permits) trigger AR adjustments for booking(s) to ensure the full cost is passed onto the client
 # manage any hedged currencies (pre purchased foreign currency), to ensure they dont re-evaluate currencies they have hedged and users are able to see if they have any exposure beyond the hedged amount

fields.description:
Prebilling of a campaign without spots in Ignitia needs to be intuitive in the way that finance user will prebill a client, and the way that the spots are later offset against the spots.

The balance of the prepaid amount needs to also be incorporated into the Media WIP to show amount that has been prebilled , amount that has been offset, and balance of the prebilled amount.

fields.description:
Ignitia needs to allow Ignitia user to advance bill spots by configuring how far ahead of time the activity in a month needs to be billed to the client.  Based on this configuration, billing to the client will be generated or prompt the user to bill the client.

The adjustment amount - difference between billed cost and actual cost of billed items for the period of activity - also needs to be managed and accounted for. The way in which adjustments are returned or billed to the client will need to be handled as part of this epic.

fields.description:
Ignitia needs to allow media team to be able to approve the following prior to finance team processes:
 * Approve items for billing prior to finance team billing the client and initiating the client billing workflow.
 * Approve items for payment prior to finance team initiating the vendor payment workflow  

This is to allow billing/payment instructions to come from the media team/account manager who is account managing the client campaign.

fields.summary: Add client sell and base amounts to booking records

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.
issuetype.name: Epic

fields.description:
h3. Current state

Billable and agency currency values are always recalculated anytime they are needed because they are not stored on the database record.

h3. Desired state

Store the calculated sell and base values on the booking records.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Address race condition in journal insertion

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.
issuetype.name: Epic

fields.description:
h3. Current state

Snapshot isolation allows for a race condition where Journals can be posted into a closed or locked period.

See attached insert stored procedure.

h3. Desired state

Each time the journals are insert the stored procedure can touch the lock record for the period, to make sure the lock record is still unlocked, and roll back the transaction if the period lock record was locked.

fields.summary: Ignitia: Create manual regression test cases

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a big user story that needs to be broken down.
issuetype.name: Epic

fields.description:
This is Epic to work on all tests that are not yet documented or documented incorrectly.  

Expected outcomes: 
Manual test cases created to cover Ignitia regression testing. 
All test cases must be reused as much as possible in future (existing test cases updated with new changes, not new test cases created for every story) 
Easy to find test cases for any functionality 
Easy knowledge transfer: Anyone can pick up and execute when needed
More bugs uncovered: As some functionalities don’t have manual or automation coverage, there will be more bugs found. 

All test cases must sit in respective test suites and confluence page updated with all of those suites: https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Test+Suites+and+Test+Cases
